summary: The network topic encapsulates a broad range of interactions beyond traditional hierarchical structures. Through innovative conceptual models, skills, and tools drawn from diverse fields, it explores decentralized organizations and ecosystems loving across space and time. Featured resources delve into subjects such as internet fragmentation and pioneering practices, aiding in the development of resilient systems.
excerpt: The term 'ecosystem' has evolved from biological roots to describe innovative, non-hierarchical structures in contemporary organizations, necessitating new conceptual models and tools.
